title: Analysis of Factors Influencing Learning Outcomes in Distance Education: A Survey-Based Study

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Elementary Mathematical Concepts and Online Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Research-Based Curriculum to Analyze Factors Influencing Learning Outcomes in Mathematics within a Blended Environment Using Digital Devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain key factors influencing learning outcomes in remote education environments (e.g., age, learning strategies, responses to instructional design).
Learners can statistically interpret correlations between survey data and learning outcomes.
Learners can design personalized learning strategies based on analysis results.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
